mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (account, password, name, email, profile_img) VALUES (#{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{profileImg})
mapper.select: SELECT account , password , name , email , auth , reg_date FROM tbl_member WHERE account = #{account}
SELECT account, name, email, auth, limit_time FROM tbl_member WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
